item.title: Freight Forwarding
item.description: Shipment of goods is a complex process 1. Shipment LifecycleSource: 2019 Business Profile | DPDHL It takes a lot of effort to deal with the whole process by the shipper. Thus in the 19th century, freight forwarders were born 2. Freight forwarding is not just taking care of the transportation from origin to destination, e.g., taking over the goods and place it on the trucks and transport it to the destination.
